description: Delete a task (only if owned by authenticated user)

204.note: No response body for successful deletion

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token

404.description: Task not found OR task exists but belongs to different user

business_logic: Query database for task WHERE id = task_id AND user_id = authenticated_user_id
user_isolation: Returns 404 if task belongs to different user (deletion is NOT applied)
idempotency: DELETE is idempotent. Subsequent DELETE of same task_id also returns 404
security: 404 prevents user enumeration (doesn't reveal if task ID exists)
